summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2781 for the improvement of Forty-second Avenue Southwest, from West Charlestown Street, to West Alaska Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all cross walks, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33320, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
